definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Conclusion The quality of life for Dementia's care giver was positively co-related with social support.
sentences.chinese: 结论老年痴呆照料者的生活质量与社会支持呈正相关。

sentences.english: But how are we treating people with dementia?
sentences.chinese: 但我们应该怎样对待老年痴呆病人？
预防朽迈，减少老年痴呆。

sentences.english: The medicine you are about to receive is a recent innovation for the treatment of senile dementia.
sentences.chinese: 你将要吃的药是最近发明出来治疗老年痴呆的。

sentences.english: Friend tell me whether grandmother of her old age dull-witted .
sentences.chinese: 朋友告诉我，她的外婆老年痴呆了。

sentences.english: Method Correlative factors of nosocomial infection in 352 old dementia patients were investigated and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾调查352例老年痴呆患者资料。

sentences.english: The researchers then followed the participants, none of whom had dementia or Parkinson's disease at the time, for four years.
sentences.chinese: 所有受试者都未罹患老年痴呆或帕金森症。

sentences.english: Early-life lead exposure can even increase risk for Alzheimer's and Parkinson's disease.
sentences.chinese: 早期铅中毒还会增加老年痴呆和帕金森症的患病几率。

sentences.english: Mutations in presenilin 1(PS1) gene are genetically linked to the early onset of familial Alzhemer's disease (EOFAD) .
sentences.chinese: 的突变是早发家族性老年痴呆发生的重要因素之一。

pinyin: A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 bing4
A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 zheng4
lao3 nian2 xing4 chi1 dai1 zheng4

definition: Alois Alzheimer (1864-1915), German psychiatrist and neuropathologist
